Class JoystickButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.input.BaseButton

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IButton

    public class JoystickButton
extends BaseButton
    Handles buttons on a joystick.
    Author:
    Benny Bobaganoosh (thebennybox@gmail.com)

    • Constructor Detail

      • JoystickButton

        public JoystickButton(IInput input,
              int joystick,
              int joystickButton)
        Creates a new JoystickButton
        Parameters:
        input - The input system
        joystick - The joystick. Should be one of the IInput.JOYSTICK values.
        joystickButton - The button on the joystick being checked.

      • JoystickButton

        public JoystickButton(IInput input,
              int joystick,
              int[] joystickButtons)
        Creates a new JoystickButton
        Parameters:
        input - The input system
        joystick - The joystick. Should be one of the IInput.JOYSTICK values.
        joystickButtons - The buttons on the joystick being checked.
